testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "CSS Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I choose "True/False" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: Then I see the "True or False" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: When I expand the "Custom CSS" section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I enter "body { background-color: red; }" in the CSS editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: When I expand the "Feedback" section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I enter "Feedback" in the feedback editor in the question designer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I click the Grade button in question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: Then I see that the question background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I see that the feedback background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: And I do not see that the response background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question with Custom CSS and verify the style is applied to the grade report

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create a new question with a theme ?[90m# CreateQuestion.feature:378?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the question name as "?[0m?[32m?[1mTheme Question?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterQuestionName(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI expand the "?[0m?[32m?[1mCustom CSS?[0m?[32m" section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.expandSection(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Theme?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickThemeButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the Choose Theme dialog?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertThemeDialog()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI drag the "?[0m?[32m?[1mJellybean?[0m?[32m" theme to the Applied Themes column?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.dragThemeToApply(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Apply?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickApplyTheme()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the theme applied to the question editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertThemeInEditor()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Preview button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickPreviewButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the theme applied to the Question Preview page?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.assertThemeApplied()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI close the question preview window?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.closeQuestionPreviewWindow()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the question designer Save & Close button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickSaveAndCloseButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see that I am on the Content Repository page?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertOnRepositoryPage()?[0m
